EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Steam Power Generation System (Boiler Zone) at (8.0, 20.5)
Consists of the following entities:
• Boiler at (8.0, 20.5)
  – Role: Produces steam fueled by coal.
  – Current status: NOT_CONNECTED; Fuel inventory: {'coal': 15}.
• Extra Steam Engine at (11.5, 18.5)
  – Role: Converts steam to electrical energy.
  – Current status: NOT_CONNECTED; Energy: 0.0.
• Offshore Pump at (1.5, 32.5)
  – Role: Supplies water to the boiler.
  – Notes: Placed after an inventory check and successful crafting; pipe connection has been attempted but remains pending due to earlier pipe shortages.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Pipe Connection Errors:
  – When connecting entities (boiler-to-steam engine and offshore pump-to-boiler), failures arose from misaligned, obstructed, or blocked connection points as well as insufficient available pipes. Always verify that both source and target connection interfaces are unobstructed, correctly aligned, and that the pipe count meets the calculated requirements.
• Inventory and Placement Issues:
  – Several errors occurred from attempting placements without confirming inventory levels (e.g. the initial absence of an offshore pump). Confirm both that the target tile is buildable and that the necessary inventory item is available prior to placement.
• Crafting Ingredient Shortages:
  – Attempts to craft additional pipes or related items failed when essential sub-ingredients (such as the required iron plates) were missing. Ensure that sufficient raw materials and an operable production or smelting facility are available before initiating such crafting routines.
• Attribute Access Errors:
  – An error was triggered by attempting to call a property (using parentheses on a 'Position' object) when computing a water patch center. Access the attribute directly rather than as a function to avoid this mistake.

NAMESPACE
────────────────────────────
get_connection_amount(boiler: Entity, extra_se: Entity, connection_type: Prototype) -> int  
  – Determines the necessary number of pipes to connect two entities; raises an exception if connectivity or spatial conditions are not met.

place_entity(entity_type: Prototype, position: Position, direction: Direction) -> Entity  
  – Attempts to place an entity of the specified type at the given position and orientation; fails if the tile is occupied or if the inventory lacks the required item.

craft_item(item: Prototype, quantity: int) -> int  
  – Initiates crafting for a specified item and quantity; throws an exception if essential sub-ingredients or a functional production facility is unavailable.

Important Variables:
• inventory: dict[str, int] — Represents the current inventory of items.
• boiler: Entity — Refers to the boiler located at (8.0, 20.5).
• extra_se: Entity — Denotes the extra steam engine at (11.5, 18.5).
• new_buildable_area: BuildableArea — Used to determine available buildable regions via its center property.
